website_summaries.verdict: The Hoka One One Vanquish 2 is a road running shoe that provides maximum cushioning for impact protection and resilient ride. The shoe gained positive and negative comments but the negative ones are not enough to overshadow the positive comments. It is ideal for daily running, walking and for long distance runs.
pros: Many testers appreciate the durable construction of the Hoka One One Vanquish 2
It provides more cushioning as compared to the original version
It is available in different color options
Many runners found the upper built breathable and comfortable
A few attested that the shoe runs true to size
cons: Based on some reviews, the shoe feels too tight and narrow

customer_reviews.title: Love Them SO Much, I Ordered a Second Pair!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used many brands of shoes over the decades. I came across Hoka completely by accident when I saw a review of them by a husky 300+ lb guy on YouTube. I'm also overweight so after listening to his review I decided to pull the trigger on a pair. Wow. Incredible, best-ever support. Since the Vanquish 3 model is out, I was able to get these Vanquish 2's for $89! After one run in them, I came home and ordered a second pair. I will say this, though...I have a narrow foot and these fit perfectly. So you might take that into consideration if you have a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: MikeL

customer_reviews.title: Best Model
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great shoe.. I have worn pairs of Vanquish 3's and I like the 2 better. The 3 is stiffer than the 2 and its gives a great ride for your foot. I power walk a lot of miles weekly so shoes don't last long for me. Both models are good shoes. I just happen to like the Vanquish 2 a little better than the 3. When I can't get the 2 anymore I will wear more 3's. Hoka has great cushioning and they are a good choice for older people, people who have sore knees and some foot problems. The cushioning is the best I have ever seen in a shoe and they melt the miles.
customer_reviews.author: RHA

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is out to lunch...
customer_reviews.text: The sizing of Hokas used to be very consistent - now it is all over the map. These were like skis, and very narrow. It used to be very easy to buy Hokas - now with their product line expansion quality and fit is all over the map. They should go back to the few line that made them successful in the first place and do them right.
customer_reviews.author: dragon88

customer_reviews.title: Great Running/Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I used to do half marathons..and own 4 pairs of these shoes(different models) They are so lite and have found, wear extremely well. I rotate them daily, these are a few years old and still rock! Small company that knows what athletes want, give them a try!!
customer_reviews.author: G Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoe I have ever own. I am saying this based on the running shoes I had in the Army and since. Nike and Asics does not come close to these shoes. They have the right amount of cushion while being light- no more burning feet for me after a run.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Narrow Fit
customer_reviews.text: As many have said and I can confirm, they are too narrow. I went for a run today and my outside toes went numb. I'm sure they'll stretch and become fine, but the break-in period will be uncomfortable. The heal slips too. The right shoe ran like a flip flop. I hope they break-in to a great shoe because the sole is great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hauser

customer_reviews.title: ... because they are noted for having durable soles and great cushioning. They have a Griffey design and a ...
customer_reviews.text: I chose these shoes because they are noted for having durable soles and great cushioning. They have a Griffey design and a rugged but smooth inner liner. i note that the rubber on the bottom is a little thinner than expected, and I am returning my first pair and going up half a size because they do not fit as expected at size 12, but otherwise they seem to live up to expectations - at least before really getting to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but order up 1/2 to a full size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Regarding size, the fit is on the narrow side, I would recommend ordering a 1/2 size up and if you're planning to run distance in these I would go a full size up. Otherwise, great feel and exactly the plush level of cushioning we've come to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Dilliard

customer_reviews.title: Fit well at 1/2 size up from typical. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1/2 size larger than typical (usually 11 USA) as some suggested and they fit good! Like the shoe a lot. Much more cushioning than I'm used to. The trade off is probably slight loss of power transfer, but I didn't purchase them to run track... 1st time Hoka buyer. Would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pidgeon

customer_reviews.title: Lower back pain eliminated!
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I paid so much for a pair of sneakers, but my back has been very appreciative I did. I'm a larger guy in the round category 5'10" @ 240#. These shoes have been a godsend in allowing me to walk and jog my dogs without having lower back pain. I can't sing the praises of these enough. I liked them so much that I went ahead and bought my wife a similar pair!
customer_reviews.author: D. Shuey

customer_reviews.title: Tight on the toes.
customer_reviews.text: I have only run in these 2 times so still adjusting. They definitely run tight toe box is cramped.i would recommend 1/2 size up like other reviews.they are a little springy when running I currently run in the Bondi 4 so it's a totally different fitting shoe. Up in the air if I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: nickchris

customer_reviews.title: My son is 17, very tall and a big ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is 17, very tall and a big guy (6' 4" 265lbs). He feet over Pronate (turned in) and that causes him to have lower back pain. These Hoka one shoes gives him the support he needs and is helping with his lower back pain when he walks. This is his second pair of the Hoka One One Vanquish 2 Running Sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Matelski

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cushion but a bad fit
customer_reviews.text: The build is great if you want to strike with you heel first. However in my case the toe box was too small, even moving a half size up. The ASICS nimbus fit better, was less expensive and still had lots of cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: docms43

customer_reviews.title: The best shoes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these shoes. Walking, running, standing for hours at a time in my shop. They are the most comfortable footwear I've ever owned. They actually feel like they are massaging my feet. I know it sounds like hyperbole but I'm completely serious.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: Vanquish 2's arrived! Vanquish 2's staying! What a fantastic shoe. Ordered 1/2 size up and fit beautifully. 6 mile first run, some hard surface, some trail, and was smiling the entire time. Been running Asics for many years(great product) but always believed there was another level of comfort and this is it. Well done Hoka!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Perrin

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable shoes ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: great fit, sole looks high but it doesn't feel high. your feet feel protected because of the protection of the sole of these shoes. My husband and son both said they are the most comfortable shoes they ever had!!!
customer_reviews.author: aimie

customer_reviews.title: As a Doctor of Physical Therapy I recommend these to all of my patients who suffer from ...
customer_reviews.text: As a Doctor of Physical Therapy I recommend these to all of my patients who suffer from Plantar Fasciitis, ankle, knee, hip and especially low back pain. I always tell my patients to spend their money on beds and shoes. Hoka shoes are worth the money and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Wade m rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Keep making amazing shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes along with a pair of M Mafate 4 Hoka cured my plantars fasciitis. I had it for almost 2 years and 1 month of wearing Hoka brand shoes I'm back to normal. Keep making amazing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Brando

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, super light and fit's perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, super light and fit's perfectly. The support is incredible, especially if you have knee and Achilles problem like me.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Roman

customer_reviews.title: Shoe size half-size too small
customer_reviews.text: I should have followed the advice of many reviewers and ordered a half-size larger (it's the width of the toe box not the length of the shoe that is smaller than industry standard). I have returned the 8.5 D pair I bought and have ordered the 9.0 D pair. Fingers crossed it works! I'll revise my rating from a 3 to whatever is appropriate once I've gotten the larger pair.
customer_reviews.author: AkamaiGuy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe, very light and fits well
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Perfect shoe, very light and fits well. I have bilateral plantar fasciitis, and helps me reduce pain. Con: Seller send me a floor model by the looks of it and I paid 99 USD ( whereas there was a price sticker of 89 USD in the box ). Bad business practice. ( hence only 3 stars )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes. Definitely get 1/2 size up from what ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. Definitely get 1/2 size up from what you normally wear. It's like wearing springs, but not too cheesy. My feet don't hurt anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and great support
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run at least a half size small compared to most brands. They are phenomenal in every way. So comfortable and great support. I got almost a year out of my last pair. I run at least 21 miles a week. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: but I love them. Went back to my old running shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'4" 275#. It took a few runs to get used to them, but I love them. Went back to my old running shoes (which I love) and they felt like cardboard after wearing these. Will never go wear anything else but Hokas.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cushion.
customer_reviews.text: Great running show but not the best fit. I'll try one size up next time.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this brand great for walking long distance very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: angela Cza

customer_reviews.title: and I recommend them to anyone of larger size who wants to ...
customer_reviews.text: I can run again! I'm 44 and 6'2"/215, and haven't been able to run more than a mile on roads without getting knee and hip pain for the last 5 +yrs. Other shoes I tried(Nike, NB, Saucony - not that they might not have some winners that I missed) all gave me the same pain. Right out of the box I took these shoes on a 3 mile asphalt run with no pain at all. I have no complaints about the fit. These shoes have been a revelation to me, and I recommend them to anyone of larger size who wants to run roads. Scott
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: My husband already has a pair and is very happy with everything about the shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband already has a pair and is very happy with everything about the shoes. The company that had the shoes could have been more informative on us tracking the shipment. Everything did arrive safely 😁🏃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: First pair of Hokas and I love them. I’m not giving up on Altras, but Hoka certainly impressed me with this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: ordered as a replacement for the same style. Fits as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect running shoes! They hug my foot good, The soul has a lot of cushion and spring. Very comfortable. My typical size is 10 and reviews said to go 1/2 size larger so I got 10 1/2. They fit good but I also feel I could've went with a size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cushion, reduced responsiveness.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the feel of the shoe, but if you're a performance freak and you need speed and control, all of this cushion absorbs your direction changes and explosive movements. So you won't get sharp movement, although you will get an extremely comfortable ride!
customer_reviews.author: TJ S

customer_reviews.title: i LOVE Hoka one one shoes for running
customer_reviews.text: i LOVE Hoka one one shoes for running, so i thought i'd try these for my everyday shoes and so far they are as good as i expected! in my opinion you can't go wrong with Hoka one one.
customer_reviews.author: sexy smooth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: The length is little big longer than regular 8.5, but it doesn't bother me at all. so it is a good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: hyunggeun cho

customer_reviews.title: Nice cushioning. I am a neutral runner
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Nice cushioning. I am a neutral runner, but at 200lbs, these work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes. Thick soles really absorb shock. I have worn them out but they have gone a lot of miles.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: I have a bone on bone ankle with Planter Fasciitis ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a bone on bone ankle with Planter Fasciitis. Hoka One Ones really ease the pain. It is night and day.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Merrell

customer_reviews.title: too small!!!!.
customer_reviews.text: i always wear 12 and fit oK. but this hoka were too small .
customer_reviews.author: emilio

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe, Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Well cushioned for folks with knee issues like me. A little narrow but not terrible. Plan on getting everything out of them that I can.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Other than that they are good for 30+ miles a
customer_reviews.text: This shoe deserves its praise, but lack enough arch support. Other than that they are good for 30+ miles a week
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, I haven't ran for 15 years due ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, I haven't ran for 15 years due to a herniated disc, I am able to run with these shoes, knees don't hurt or back like my previous running shoes
customer_reviews.author: Cameron M. Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too narrow in the toe box
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoe, but much too narrow in the toe box for my foot (which has been well documented in other places). No faults in the shoe, I just have hobbit feet.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Very Different From Stinson Lite
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Stinson Lites from last year - great shoe with awesome cushion and plenty of room for a custom insole/orthotic. This pair of VAnquish 2 is a stark disappointment. Narrower, stiffer, and the cushion isn't as good. Still a nice shoe, but seems like a different brand. I was looking through reviews on other models and someone mentioned the company changed hands. Not sure if that's true, but it provides an answer as to why they are so different. I really enjoyed the Stinson Lites, but unless I can find more of those, I'll be sticking with Mizuno for now. Disappointed, especially at this price point,
customer_reviews.author: American Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good Love Hoka's
customer_reviews.text: will post again after a few more runs. So far so good Love Hoka's
customer_reviews.author: dryck

customer_reviews.title: great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe design fits my natural form of running: great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Dietrich Bettinger

customer_reviews.title: and I like that. The Clifton kind of made me feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit smaller than other Hokas I've had but my favorites thus far. They feel a bit more firm than my Clifton 2s, and I like that. The Clifton kind of made me feel a bit wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Mox

customer_reviews.title: These are the best running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the best running shoes! Took a few mikes to get used to them, but the feel on my feet when running is amazing. Got the recovery sandals also and I will not buy another brand after wearing them after a long run or day of work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Very Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for my wife and she absolutely loved the lightweight feel and support working on her feet for hours. A great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Woodard

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are extremely comfortable, but the do run a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are extremely comfortable, but the do run a little narrow. Nothing I couldn't get use to or that caused any type of hot spots or blisters.

customer_reviews.title: But they're the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: They run about a half size small. But they're the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. My new favorite shoe company.
customer_reviews.author: Hedshart7722

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes ever! I am big boy 245 ish and these are great to wokout in and run!!! Wow thanks guys ! #Vonpetersen
customer_reviews.author: Paul Von Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable pair of running shoes i have put on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, light and great cushion
customer_reviews.text: ordered 1/2 size larger and as advised and fits well. comfortable, light and great cushion.
customer_reviews.author: larry wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Eliminated the pain I was having during running. Arrived quickly and fit as expected. Would unconditionally recommend to anyone looking for a shoe upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Jandreau

customer_reviews.title: Not neutral!
customer_reviews.text: Says it is for neutral tread but it is for those who step a little overpronator! Nothing to hinder the race!
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: No clifton
customer_reviews.text: Not as foot steady as the Clifton s A poor man's version, Bhutan still good compared to mainstream brands
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Hoka fit beautifully. The price was more to my liking without blowing my budget.
customer_reviews.author: Steam2954

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and fit right. Second pair of Hoka's. They're awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Carlucci

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes but too narrow and there is no wider option
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoe was great, but I ordered a size that fit too ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was great, but I ordered a size that fit too snugly for my running preferences. HOKA makes a fine product. Just know your size.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not Amazons fault I ordered the incorrect shoe size. But they stretch with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable shoe that is great on roads and trails
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable shoe that is great on roads and trails. Did not like so much on a track that had additional cushioned material. Just my own feel for the shoe, all other surfaces were great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use the shoe at work as I am standing most of the time. Excellent support and comfortable. The D width isn't quite a D. More like C.
customer_reviews.author: P. Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoes ever. Excellent cushioning, light and great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Hani Al-Ghalib

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my Hoka running shoes...
customer_reviews.text: Love my Hoka shoes ! Cushioned and supportive on my long runs. Glad that I have discovered these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Walker

customer_reviews.title: If you wear WIDE shoes, these may fit you well.  Do not be discouraged by the lack of a WIDE WIDTH option.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear Asics or New Balance 2E. These are regular width but I am very comfortable in them. In fact, they are like walking on clouds all day. I could not be more pleased. These are the shoes that I have always wanted but could never find. They are made with comfort in mind. They are super-light as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bug

customer_reviews.title: Not a convert to the Hoka club. 😕
customer_reviews.text: I returned them. That was the best part. Great service on that. The Hoka brand has a following & reputation which wasn't met in this shoe. I found them to be narrow across the balls of my feet. They have a really high arch & a drop in the toe box that just didn't work for me. I have friends that love their Hoka's but these weren't as good as any ASICS or Saucony I've run in & definitely not for the list price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Strobel

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great made shoe. Seems to correct improper footing ie pronation very well. Would have liked the toe covering more breathable. Overall happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price really expected much more as far as comfort goes..
customer_reviews.author: RONNIE LOCKE

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came as expected but they feel too narrow behind my toes and I will return them for a different pair of hoka's
customer_reviews.author: Ben williams

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Never been a fan of something that someone says is to good to be true but after buying my first pair of Hokas I must say that these shoes are so far great! I've worn them for nearly two weeks and have a 1/4th of the foot and knee pain I had prior with the use of several top name running shoes. I have no drawbacks to post at this time. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, not as bulky as my previous Hoka's
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, not as bulky as my previous Hoka's. First walk with them was 6.5 miles and I had no irritation or soreness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! My husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! My husband loves them. Great support and cushioning. We bought half a size up as we read they might be a bit tight. They fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! The most comfortable shoes I've owned. I feel much quicker in them.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I am in love, perfect running shoes for a Chobi guy
customer_reviews.text: I am in love , perfect running shoes for a Chobi guy !!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe right out of box into first run. No issues!
customer_reviews.author: Brian D Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: My dad wears thick socks and these shoes didn't provide enough space for him. These were expensive and there was no returning them so I was dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Uybungco AZ

customer_reviews.title: Best looking pair yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best looking HOKA ONE ONE shoe I have owned over the past 5 years of wearing them to run. The comfort level is amazing as always. I would highly suggest anyone who loves to run and might have chin split issues to buy a pair. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Marshmallows
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe so far nice and soft sole for my poor feet. The blue is bright!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: and the Vanquish is by far the better pair!
customer_reviews.text: The Vanquish has been my go to runners since I've gone from the Brooks Glycerins. I've worn the Clifton also, and the Vanquish is by far the better pair!!!
customer_reviews.author: WCH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Long-Distance Runner
customer_reviews.text: I just completed my fastest half-marathon with these shoes and they handled the shock of the pavement like champions! A lot of cushion and support but without the heaviness. Lightweight and comfy - like running on clouds.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Burke

customer_reviews.title: Love Hoka's, the others I tried are good but ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 pairs after wearing similar Hoka's. For my runs and height weight they rule! Love Hoka's, the others I tried are good but this one fits my needs best.
customer_reviews.author: B. D. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoe but it was narrow in the toe box. Bought a different Hoka model and really loved it
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Steinfeldt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes very comfortable will always continue to upgrade with these
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fit snap of the feel when running and the comfort
customer_reviews.author: Sacramento perry's

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size I'm 10 -10.5 but this 10.5 shoe some what a little tight
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: First time purchase. Easy on the knees when running. Great cushioning and support. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: B. Rum

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were very tight. I am going to try a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Girlfriend36

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. For a running shoe, they provide excellent support. And the cushioning - like walking on air. I don't run, but I work out and walk long distances and no other shoe has ever come close. Don't mind paying the $170 at all. In fact, I bought a backup pair since shoe companies are always it seems changing something about a great shoe (besides the color). Five Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great expensive shoe
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but Very comfortable. Great show. Only wish toe box was a little wider. Still, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. F. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Pillows for your feet.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them for about a week. But I can honestly say that they're the most comfortable sneaker I've ever had. Like air.
customer_reviews.author: mark delatorre

customer_reviews.title: Very light and great for running
customer_reviews.text: Very light and great for running. I'm only getting four stars because I never purchased any other running shoe other than general sneakers
customer_reviews.author: Fischer

product_meta.title: Hoka One One Men's Vanquish 2 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: The VANQUISH 2 is a super-cushioned and versatile shoe for the runner looking for a springy, responsive ride..
